metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6636 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Android API before 17 does not properly restrict theWebView.addJavascriptInterface method, which allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary methods of Java objects by using the Java Reflection APIwithin crafted JavaScript code that is loaded into the WebView component inan application targeted to API level 16 or earlier, a related issue toCVE-2013-4710.

criterions.comment: cordova-ubuntu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
